lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin Cib rUp rMg soBw iniD kotin kotwin koit jgmg joiq kY
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Chhabi Roop Rang Sobhaa Nidhi , Kotani Kotaani Koti Jagamag Joti Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Despite presence of millions of beauties, forms, complexions, treasure-houses of splendour and glory, presence of lights effulgent;

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin rwj Bwg pRBqw pRqwpu kotin kotwin suK AnMd audoq kY
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Raaj Bhaag Prabhataa Prataapu , Kotani Kotaani Soukh Anand Udot Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Appearing of kingdoms, rules, grandeurs and glory, comforts and peace;

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin rwg nwid bwd igAwn gun kotin kotwin jog Bog Eq poiq kY
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Raag Naadi Baad Giaan Gouna , Kotani Kotaani Jog Bhog Aot Poti Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: Despite presence of millions of tunes and melodies of music, classical knowledge, pleasures and relishments integrated like weft and woof,

lines.gurmukhi: kotin kotwin iql mihmw AgwiD boiD nmo nmo diRsit drs sbd sRoq kY ]265]
lines.transliteration_english: Kotani Kotaani Til Mahimaa Agaadhi Bodhi , Namo Namo Drisati Daras Sabad Srot Kai ?265?

Shabad OS B.translation: All these glories are paltry. The glory of merging once consciousness in the words of Guru, a glimpse of and a graceful look of the True Guru is beyond expression. Salutations to Him again and again. (265)
